pullrequest.title: [gz11]Support for Levels: Add and remove entities

content.raw: Had an offline discussion with @chapulina about using services for deleted entities and decided that it's better to use pub/sub with a dedicated topic to get notified when entities are deleted. Thus, I have renamed the `request` topic to `deletion` and changed the message type to `UInt32_V`.
content.html: Had an offline discussion with @chapulina about using services for deleted entities and decided that it's better to use pub/sub with a dedicated topic to get notified when entities are deleted. Thus, I have renamed the request topic to deletion and changed the message type to UInt32_V.
